name: Mortal Kombat II
overview: Nothing, NOTHING can prepare you! The fierce kombatants of the #1 arcade smash gather for Mortal Kombat II, a battle to defeat the shape-shifting demon Shang Tsung and his ruthless master, Shao Kahn. Brutal special moves, Babalities, hidden surprises, outrageous finishing moves -- ALL yours to kommand. Let the Kombat Kontinue...
